Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class DepositController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.DepositController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/deposit") public class DepositController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling deposit related requests. It provides endpoints for getting all deposits, filtering deposits, getting a deposit by id, opening a deposit, updating a deposit, and deleting a deposit.

  • Method Details

    • getAllDeposits

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Deposit>> getAllDeposits()
      This method is used to get all deposits.
      Returns:
      A list of all deposits.

    • filterDeposits

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/filter") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Deposit>> filterDeposits(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(value="sort",defaultValue="asc") String sort)
      This method is used to filter deposits.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number.
      size - The size of the page.
      sort - The sort order.
      Returns:
      A page of filtered deposits.

    • getDepositById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Deposit> getDepositById(@PathVariable("id") Long depositId)
      This method is used to get a deposit by id.
      Parameters:
      depositId - The id of the deposit.
      Returns:
      The deposit with the given id.

    • openDeposit

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Deposit> openDeposit(@RequestBody DepositRequest request)
      This method is used to open a deposit.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing the card number, deposit amount, description, and currency.
      Returns:
      The opened deposit.

    • updateDeposit

      @ResponseStatus(ACCEPTED) @PutMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public void updateDeposit(@PathVariable("id") Long depositId, @RequestBody DepositRequest request)
      This method is used to update a deposit.
      Parameters:
      depositId - The id of the deposit.
      request - The request containing the card number, description, deposit amount, and currency.

    • deleteDeposit

      @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public void deleteDeposit(@PathVariable("id") Long depositId)
      This method is used to delete a deposit.
      Parameters:
      depositId - The id of the deposit.
